name: Angry Mountain Gods
description:
Pick up the mask of a forgotten god and lead hikers to a fiery doom!

A digital board game with support for up to 4 human or AI players.

Angry Mountain Gods is a combination of tactics and pure chaos. It's the perfect antidote to a calm and boring evening with family and friends.

  • SUMMON hikers to climb the volcano in your name!
  • BURN trees to clear their path
  • GROW trees to block enemy hikers
  • STUN enemy hikers with bolts of lightning
  • UNLEASH chaotic boulders which smash everything in their path!
  • BEWARE OF GOATS

This version is a complete experience that has been thoroughly tested. 

That said, Angry Mountain Gods is still in active development. (those sounds are totally temporary!) If you encounter a defect, or something you like or didn't like, please leave a comment below. I'll be sure to respond. Thank you!
